Mint College's Body of Information Technologists

Acquire | Develop | Apply

Vision

We aim to be a diverse community of driven and engaged ambassadors of Technology and its further advancement.

Mission

Our goal as an organization is to be in a constant pursuit of acquiring knowledge, developing skills and applying it by readily offering our assistance to the industry and those outside.
